attributes.review:
Hello my names Karen, I have not downloaded a worse app since the iPhone 4 was around. I am appalled by this app and what trumps true intentions were for this app. Once I downloaded it, AFTER 4 DAYS OF WAITING 💩. The app immediately took up too much storage on my ICloud which I do NOT appreciate. 🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏻‍♂️I would go off of the political side of this app but the quality of this app... is astronomically bad. I’m not sure how to contact the creators of this app but this app asked for my location and mic services.. WHAT THE HELL DO YALL NEED THAT FOR? HUH? TRUMP! what do you have to say for yourself. I head Android users are dealing with this crap as well! 👁👃🏾👁 This is unacceptable and my husband who is big in the oil industry were to understand the level of stupidity and invasive this app truly is. He would not stand for it. Thank you. 

Not a fan of this app or your campaign ANYMORE DONALD.

Ps I really hope you stopped raping young girls... and I also hope you go to jail for the things you did to the women you assaulted.
